PROCESSBUILDING AN EXCEPTIONAL FUTURE  
THROUGH SUSTAINABLE PRACTICES
In order to secure a sustainable future for our business and stakeholders, MGP is  
dedicated to achieving excellence in its operations and supply chain.
Our processes are the foundation of everything we do, and our stringent standards and 
attention to detail in our processes means we go above and beyond to ensure we are 
establishing ethical and compliant practices, protecting data privacy and cybersecurity, 
responsibly sourcing ingredients, managing risks effectively, and minimizing the  
environmental and social impacts of our supply chain.
